%UEMACS

# NAME

uemacs - uemacs text editor

# SYNOPSIS

**uemacs** \<filename\>

**uemacs** \[options\]

# DESCRIPTION

manual page for uemacs

# OPTIONS

\+
: start at the end of file

\+\<n\>
: start at line \<n\>

\-g\[G\]\<n\>
: go to line \<n\>

\-\-help
: display this help and exit

\-\-version
: output version information and exit
